name: MidLight
description:
MidLight

It is a simple 2D platformer game with beautiful eye catching visuals.

This game features 6  visually stunning environments.

In it you have alot of dynamic objects to smash them around.

So wear your headphones sit back relax and enjoy the game :)

Controls

"Space" is the master key.

-------------------------------------------------

This game is not tested on all platforms but hope will work fine.

If you have any problem feel free to contact.
